import React from"react";import i18n from"i18next";import{useTranslation,initReactI18next}from"react-i18next";import translationEN from'./locals/translationEN.json';import translationRU from'./locals/translationRU';var resources={en:{translation:translationEN},ru:{translation:translationRU}};i18n.use(initReactI18next)// passes i18n down to react-i18next
.init({resources:resources,lng:"en",interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
